channel.title: Slayer assignment help etc
channel.description:
Alright, well my slayer system is messed up i suppose I can't take task it teleports me to karamja and disconnects me when i use the enchanted gem err idk ive searched for a tut but i can't find one? plus a random monster gives slayer xp.
Im on delta.
